text: I do not know how often people in this community need integration of LightGraphs.jl and igraph, but I find myself to require it quite a lot so I have written a basic tutorial on how this can be done: <https://bkamins.github.io/julialang/2021/04/09/igraph.html>

attachments.title: A tutorial on igraph for Julia
attachments.fallback: Blog by Bogumił Kamiński: A tutorial on igraph for Julia
